title: Neal_Caffrey
author: Neal_Caffrey
content: Hello,I am looking for the footprint for the BM1720 or BM1760 ASIC chip.

comments.author: GFDhd
comments.body: I do not quite understand what you mean. Do you mean to know the pin function of the BM1760 ASIC chip?

comments.author: Neal_Caffrey
comments.body: I mean the measurements of the solder pads. I want to create a custom PCB.

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: Quote from: Neal_Caffrey on August 07, 2022, 03:07:44 PMI mean the measurements of the solder pads. I want to create a custom PCB. There aren't [m]any ASIC designers here, just users. Wouldn't Bitmain publish those specs?Good luck.
